publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3709 Rob Gibson: GREAN Boost for Golspie—That the Parliament congratulates Golspie Recycling and Environmental Action Network (GREAN) on winning the Member of the Year Award at the Community Recycling Network for Scotland Awards; recognises the vital and excellent work that GREAN provides to the community of East Sutherland as well as to the wider Highlands in running an exemplary recycling business; notes the important contribution that GREAN makes to both Highland and national recycling targets and the jobs that it offers to people in the community; calls for continued grant aid to support this vital social enterprise, and wishes the management and workers continued success and the best for the future.

S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*, David Stewart*, Kenneth Gibson*, Angela Constance*, Robin Harper*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Patrick Harvie*, Mary Scanlon*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Brian Adam*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Maureen Watt*, Jamie Stone*

S3M-3709 Rob Gibson: GREAN Boost for Golspie—That the Parliament congratulates Golspie Recycling and Environmental Action Network (GREAN) on winning the Member of the Year Award at the Community Recycling Network for Scotland Awards; recognises the vital and excellent work that GREAN provides to the community of east Sutherland as well as to the wider Highlands in running an exemplary recycling business; notes the important contribution that GREAN makes to both Highland and national recycling targets and the jobs that it offers to people in the community; calls for continued grant aid to support this vital social enterprise, and wishes the management and workers continued success and the best for the future. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, David Stewart, Kenneth Gibson, Angela Constance, Robin Harper, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Patrick Harvie, Mary Scanlon, Alasdair Allan, Sandra White, Brian Adam, Christine Grahame, Maureen Watt, Jamie Stone, Jamie McGrigor*
S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Dave Thompson*
S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3709 GREAN Boost for Golspie (lodged on 16 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
